Body: Possible Duplicate:  Is it possible to have multiple instances of the same app (logged in to different accounts)?  I have a dual-sim Android device, an Alcatel Onetouch.As it has two SIM cards, I'm just wondering if there is any chance of installing two instances of applications such as Whatsapp in order to have it working for both phone numbers.I have been searching on several forums without finding any valid answer to my question, answers use to be ambiguous.I would like to clarify this matter.
Title: Is it possible to install two instances of a same app?

history.Text: I have a dual-sim Android device, an Alcatel Onetouch.As it has two SIM cards, I'm just wondering if there is any chance of installing two instances of applications such as Whatsapp in order to have it working for both phone numbers.I have been searching on several forums without finding any valid answer to my question, answers use to be ambiguous.I would like to clarify this matter.
Is it possible to install two instances of a same app?
